spells.name: Bull's Strength
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Corruption Resistance
spells.description: Protects creature against damage from alignment-based attacks.

spells.name: Desecrate
spells.description: Fills area with negative energy; aids undead.

spells.name: Eagle's Splendor
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.

spells.name: Scare
spells.description: Frightens creature of less than 6 HD.

spells.name: Summon Monster II
spells.description: (Evil creatures only.) Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.
